Question & Options:
In the context of the movie 'Chhoti Si Baat' released in 2013, which of the following best describes what movies generally encompass?
Options:
A. A movie is solely defined by its box office earnings.
B. Movies consist of a narrative, characters, dialogue, acting, and various technical elements.
C. Movies are only about special effects and action sequences.
D. A movie is just a collection of scenes without any storyline.
Correct Answer: Movies consist of a narrative, characters, dialogue, acting, and various technical elements.
